QuestData.Title: Mogu Make Poor House Guests
QuestData.Description: Leven sent Rook here to stop mogu, but there are more than Rook can kill alone.$B$BYou help? Rook will tell Leven you helped. Promise.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 6 Shado-Tien attackers in Mistfall Village.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Rook Stonetoe at Mistfall Village in the Vale of Eternal Blossoms.
